mutants.original_line: count = sum(1 for char in word if char in vowels)
mutants.mutated_line: count = sum((2 for char in word if char in vowels))

mutants.original_line: count = sum(1 for char in word if char in vowels)
mutants.mutated_line: count = sum((0 for char in word if char in vowels))

mutants.original_line: count = sum(1 for char in word if char in vowels)
mutants.mutated_line: count = sum((0 for char in word if char in vowels))

mutants.original_line: count = sum(1 for char in word if char in vowels)
mutants.mutated_line: count = sum((-1 for char in word if char in vowels))

mutants.original_line: count = sum(1 for char in word if char in vowels)
mutants.mutated_line: count = sum((1 for char in word if char not in vowels))
